channel.title: Notes on Peter Scriven
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Peter Scriven

item.title: People I Admire
item.description: Globally People from around the world who’s work I admire. For the most part, a mix of software development, data viz and design. Sarah Drasner Tom Macwright Maggie Appleton Dan Abramov Amelia Wattenberger Josh Comeau Stephanie Tuerk Evan Peck New Zealand A bit closer to home. Sam Jarman Amir Mohtasebi Aaron Schiff Nate Watson Peers People I’ve worked with / know IRL. Maz Hermon Will Hardwick-Smith Luke Mansell Will Richardson Josh Richards Daisy Rendell Nick Webster Jamie Sanson Simon Merrick Tana Tanoi Cam Bryers Andre Westerlund Josh Lowe People who have cool websites I used them as reference for this one!
